function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of SARS CoV-2 virus in indoor environments","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and transmission","Mitigation":"Proper ventilation and air filtration systems, reduced occupancy, and enhanced cleaning protocols","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV-C disinfection, and smart HVAC systems","People":"Building occupants, employees, visitors","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Extended stays in indoor environments","Impact":"Negative impact on mental and physical health","Mitigation":"Promoting outdoor activities, maintaining proper ventilation, and providing access to natural light","Technologies":"Biophilic design, circadian lighting systems, and ergonomic furniture","People":"Building occupants, especially those working from home","Owner":"Employers, building owners, and facility managers"},{"Description":"Social equity and demographics","Impact":"Increased disparities in access to indoor environments and amenities","Mitigation":"Ensuring equitable access to resources, addressing housing inequalities, and promoting community support programs","Technologies":"Data analytics for resource allocation, community engagement platforms, and affordable housing initiatives","People":"Marginalized communities, low-income individuals","Owner":"Government agencies, community organizations, and housing developers"}]}
